articles.author: Mike Hale
articles.title: The 50 TV Shows You Need to Watch This Winter
articles.description: Just kidding. There are actually a lot more.
articles.content:
With the young Pope Pius XIII (Jude Law) still in a coma, John Malkovich takes on the role of the new pope in Paolo Sorrentinos Vatican phantasmagoria. (HBO, Jan. 13)
A girl raised underground finds herself on the surface amid hungry, but really cute, beasts… [+1120 chars]

articles.author: Ben Kenigsberg
articles.title: ‘Advocate’ Review: Defending More Than Just Her Clients
articles.description: A portrait of an Israeli lawyer who takes on difficult cases involving Palestinian clients.
articles.content: The lawyer Lea Tsemel is a contentious figure in Israel. She is known for representing Palestinian defendants, especially in cases in which Israeli sentiment appears starkly stacked against her, such as those that involve violent attacks. Depending on your pe… [+1124 chars]

articles.author: Bilal Qureshi
articles.title: ‘Ghost Stories’ Review: Bollywood Aims for Frights
articles.description: With this Netflix anthology, four directors from Indian cinema draw horror from a country’s lived reality.
articles.content: Ghost Stories is a new Netflix anthology of four horror films made by some of Bollywoods leading filmmakers. To those unaware that Indian cinema has long surpassed the clichés of MGM-style musicals and Technicolor kitsch, this movie introduces the talents and… [+1699 chars]
